title: What is Yoga
content: Yoga is an ancient practice that improves physical flexibility, mental clarity, and overall well-being.

title: Benefits of Tadasana
content: Tadasana helps improve posture, balance, and strengthens the spine. It is good for beginners.

title: Benefits of Shavasana
content: Shavasana helps relax the body, reduce stress, and calm the nervous system.

title: Yoga During Pregnancy
content: Pregnant women should avoid intense yoga poses and must consult a doctor or certified yoga instructor.

title: Pranayama Basics
content: Pranayama involves breathing techniques that improve lung capacity and calm the mind.
